data.name: MORDARE
data.detailed_description:
PLEASE ADD TO WISHLIST


About the Game

SYNOPSIS

The action takes place in '96 America, in Los Angeles. You find yourself in jail for a crime, but the next morning you wake up in a cell with an open cell and no staff. You are the only one who knows what happened, tell the detective what happened and maybe it will save your life.

GAME

This place is full of mysteries, strangeness and unexplained things. You are the only person who has been in this creepy police station, can you save yourself, prove you are innocent and keep your sanity?

FEATURES

Perform important actions with QTE support

The atmospheric art-house setting is creepy and feels like an empty, depressing, abandoned police station, but is it really?

Gameplay - intuitive mechanics and controls.

Puzzles - There are a small number of puzzles that won't make it difficult to complete

Audio - you will feel the whole atmosphere of horror and helplessness thanks to the excellent soundtrack and effects

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3240 and AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 with 2GB VRAM and AMD Radeon HD 6950 with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance (Low to Medium setting) 1080p/60fps. The frame rate may drop in graphics-intensive scenes.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4440 and AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti with 2GB VRAM and AMD Radeon RX 460 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance (High settings) 1080p/120fps. The frame rate may drop in graphics-intensive scenes.

  • OS: OS X Version 10.10 and up
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance (Low to Medium setting) 1080p/60fps. The frame rate may drop in graphics-intensive scenes.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or may not be suitable for viewing in the workplace: Frequent violent or violent scenes, Adult Content.
